divs: sighting detailsme and my friend was outside looking at the fireworks when we looked and saw something werid looking weird my friend looked over at me and said what was that is was orange\red thing hovering up in the sky and then disapperd out of nowhere there we came in to tell someone on what we saw and then walked back out side and saw bout 9 more come and go i tried to debunk it as either a plane or a lantern but this looks nothing like that .. it ended soon after the fireworks arounf the neighborhood did
